title: Topic segmentation sunburst chart — plot_topic_segmentation
text: data RDB referendum data returned rfrnds(). data frame minimum contains columns topics_tier_1, topics_tier_2 topics_tier_3. method Applied method count number topic occurences. One "per_rfrnd": referendums weight. referendum n different topics tier, every topic counted 1/n. "per_topic_lineage": topic lineages weight. referendum n different topics tier, every topic fully counted, meaning e.g. referendum three different tier-3 topics tripled impact result compared referendum single one. Noticeably faster "per_rfrnd". "naive": Naive procedure properly reflect topic proportions tier 2 3. Based (wrong) assumptions ) referendums number topic lineages assigned b) topics deduplicated per tier. far fastest method, though.
